description_text:
Greetings, I have an issue with my SIMSONN Plus (Load cell date 01/01/2024)
pedals. I tried every single version of the SIMSONN manager, none of them
worked. All of them showed this exact thing when I went into the "Devices"
tab .
[image: image.png]

I've tried to manually install firmware, it says it has missing files.
Nothing worked, please, can you send the file so I could manually update
the SIMSONN Manager so it detects my pedals?
Much appreciated
Nazarii

conversations.body_text: Hi Назарий К,  You can test and restore using Freejoy 1.7.0. If it is version 1.7.1, you can update the pedal firmware in Simsonn Manager via Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → Pedals → firmware → pedals-plus.sfu.            https://drive.google.com/file/d/1hnHNudj0VhE6xr7ypu-KeEDuVrlVHVg9/view?usp=drive_link
